FuncDef:
The lsp-path full-display command enables all devices, including Ps along an LSP to be displayed in an NQA test result.
The undo lsp-path full-display command removes the Ps along an LSP displayed in the NQA test result.
By default, you can view only PEs along an LSP in the NQA test result.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After an NQA VPLS PW trace test is carried out on an L2VPN with Ps, you can run the lsp-path full-display command to check the complete LSP in the test result.
Precautions
The lsp-path full-display command is applicable only to VPLS PW trace test instances. Therefore, the test type must be VPLS PW trace.
